title: What is the most prestigious school in England? - Quora

response.answer_text: Opinions will vary. But if you asked me for prestige rather than fame, then I would probably say Westminster. Each year around 48% of school leavers from Westminster go to Oxford or Cambridge. That is so far ahead of their nearest competitor, they would need to catch a bus to visit them. It is an extraordinary school, and extraordinarily difficult to get into.
